mapper.select: SELECT b.title, b.content, b.reg_date, u.name, b.group_no, b.order_no, b.depth, b.hit, b.user_no FROM board b,user u WHERE b.no = #{no} AND b.user_no = u.no
mapper.update: UPDATE board b SET b.hit=b.hit+1 WHERE b.no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.reg_date, u.name, b.group_no, b.order_no, b.depth, b.hit, b.user_no FROM board b,user u WHERE b.user_no = u.no AND (title like CONCAT('%',#{kwd},'%') OR content like CONCAT('%',#{kwd},'%')) ORDER BY b.group_no DESC, b.order_no LIMIT #{num}, 5
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET order_no=order_no+1 WHERE group_no=#{group_no} and order_no>#{order_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES(null, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{user_no}, (select ifnull( max( group_no ), 0 ) + 1 FROM board AS b), 1, 0, 0)
